name: .MMG File Extension
summary: Learn about .MMG files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An MMG file contains a toolpath saved in the Model Master 3 Axis Flat format. It stores computer numerical control (CNC) instructions, which include XYZ axes coordinates used to direct a machine tool, such as a drill or boring tool, during production. MMG files are similar to .NC files.

content: MMG files specify 2D or 3D machine toolpaths and their coordinates and translate toolpaths into a format that machine tools can understand.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
